name: Find chimeric pairs and reads
tagline: These BASH script allow to extract chimeric pairs and chimeric reads from NGS data mixing 2 DNA references
body:
# Welcome to Chimera_finder Pages.
Short description
Simple bash script written for Debian Unix environments

## Download and execute

```
$ git clone repo_name my_folder/
```
### Dependencies:
* Sickle
* Bowtie2
* Samtoools
* Bedtools

## Authors and Contributors
Adrien Leger @a-slide

## Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? 
Check out the readme file at https://github.com/a-slide/Find_chimeric_pairs_and_reads/blob/master/README.md or contact adrien.leger@inserm.fr
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
